example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS استغرب) (NP-SBJ-5 (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الموظف)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN بلدية) (NP (NOUN_PROP صوفر))))) (NP-OBJ (NP (DEM_PRON_MS هذا)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الامر))) (PUNC ,) (S-ADV (VP (ADJ.VN+CASE_INDEF_ACC متسائلاً) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-5)) (SBARQ (WHADVP-2 (REL_ADV كيف)) (S (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-6 (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_DU_ACC الاثنين)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC معاً))) (VP (IV3MD+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:D_MOOD:I يستحصلان) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-6)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN براءة) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الذمة))) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN لعقارات)) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN نفس) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها)))))))))) (ADVP-PRD (-NONE- *T*-2))))))))

arg.g: How do the two together issuing clearance for the same buildings

example.arg: كيف ان الاثنين معا يستحصلان على براءة الذمة للعقارات نفسها
